tasks.title: EPIC: Ad functionality to sv workspaces
tasks.body: Add a command for sv ws for changing your direcory to that of a workspace/worktree based on the workspace name. Allow for selecting from a list of the active workspaces if no name is given as a param

tasks.title: Add 'b' command for 'Blocked by'
tasks.body: Add a 'b' command to the list pane that opens a selection for another task (or none) that is blocking the selected task

tasks.title: Epic: Inline editor shared pane layout
tasks.body: Use the Details pane as the shared inline editor for New/Edit task flows. Break work into small subtasks (layout, truncation fix, children multi-select).

tasks.title: Epic: Additional TUI commands
tasks.body:
Epic to deliver new task creation and editing commands in the TUI.

Scope
- Add 'n' new task wizard (title required; optional priority/relations/description).
- Add 'p' change priority for selected task.
- Add 'e' inline edit for selected task.
- Update keybindings/help so users can discover new commands.
- Add reasonable test coverage for the new flows.

tasks.title: Improve TUI command help
tasks.body: In the command quick help shown, show the move, escape/quit commands, and the '?' for More commands. In New/Edit, also have the 'c' for create/confirm behaviour

tasks.title: Add caret to Title writing/editing
tasks.body: Inserting Titlte and editing it can be improved. Use a 1 character caret, not makrk the whole line. Allow for moving the cursor(caret) left and right with arrows.

tasks.title: Add additional fields to new/edit pane
tasks.body: We want two new seelct options, selecting multiple tasks (or none) of 'Blocking': The tasks that this task is blocking. And 'Blocked by': The tasks that block this task

tasks.title: Make colours more palatable for new/edit tasks
tasks.body:
Make placeholder text the same gray as List panels task Id
Make the Field label white
Can we make the colors be the same regardless of the terminals colorscheme

tasks.title: Add '?' command
tasks.body:
Let '?' commad in list and edit/add neew task show an inline view of the rest of the commands now as we get som amny of them.
The only commands e should keep are:
- 'enter'/'c' to conirm
- 'j/k' for navigating up and down
- 'tab' for next field
- 'esc'/'q' for cancel/quit

tasks.title: Add 'd' command to delete a task
tasks.body:
Use a confirmation dialogasking the user if they are sure they wnt to delete the task.
Should unassign all relations, then remove the task

tasks.title: Fix issue with parent and children relations
tasks.body:
There is no way in new/edit mode to unassign a parent to a task. Unsure if the `sv task unrelate` is working or not
The Children selection doesn't preselct previously selected tasks.
The Children selection doesn't clear out relations if no task is selected and we press 'enter'. It should. We need a way to unassign relations.

tasks.title: EPIC: Add vim-like editing experience to text editing/insertion
tasks.body: The body editing experience is poor. Can we when entering insert text mode here, open a vim editor for that field?\n- When we save and quit editing this field we should read from the file write buffer to take that text and insert into the Body field instead. This will make the UX here much better.\n- Noticed that I can confirm creation of the new task now. It is blocked by the Children step. Add a 'c' command (for create task) that takes us right to the confirmation dialog.

tasks.title: TUI: add 'c' command to jump to confirmation dialog
tasks.body: Allow pressing 'c' in the new task editor to attempt confirm immediately (bypass Children step) and show confirmation dialog. Update key hints/help text.

tasks.title: TUI: sync Body field from external editor buffer
tasks.body: On editor exit, read temp file contents and update Body field. Preserve exact content (including empty); handle non-zero exit by keeping prior body and showing an error message.

tasks.title: TUI: prepare external editor session for Body field
tasks.body: Suspend TUI, write Body to temp file, launch editor from $VISUAL then $EDITOR (fallback to vi), then restore terminal. Surface a clear error if no editor is found or launch fails.

tasks.title: TUI: use external editor for Body field by default
tasks.body: Replace inline Body insert with external editor flow; entering Body edit should always launch the editor (no extra keybinding). Update any help text that mentions inline insert.

tasks.title: Fix inline editor body truncation after first line
tasks.body: Body input currently truncates after one line; ensure multi-line editing works in inline editor.

tasks.title: Enable multi-select in Children picker
tasks.body: Selecting Children with Enter should open the picker; allow multi-select with Space (similar to Parent selector).

tasks.title: Refactor inline editor to use Details pane
tasks.body: Use the Details pane for New/Edit task editor (shared layout). Update header text to New Task / Edit Task.

tasks.title: Add 'ctrl+enter' option in inline editor
tasks.body: When in inline editor, if all feilds look okay, we should be able to always use 'ctrl+enter' to go to the confirmation scren, as if we just pressed enter on the last field.

tasks.title: Improve shared edit/add task editor
tasks.body: Body should be possible to write and edit as if it were a vim editor. I need to be able to seethe multiple lines and full text while writing.

tasks.title: Fix inline editor select options
tasks.body: All of Priority, Parent, and Children aren't focused when selected inside the inline editor. So we can select choices until we close out of the inline editor, defeating the purpose of them. Only the topmost inline shoild have focus and catch all keystrokes.

tasks.title: Inline editor improvements (epic)
tasks.body: Epic to track inline editor UX improvements. Child tasks cover: inner-field key handling, priority select styling, parent lookup/autocomplete, rename Relates->Children behavior, remove relate note, rename Description->Body, and edit mode fields (sv-j5a).

tasks.title: Fix parallel sv take lease creation JSON parse error
tasks.body: concurrency_stress lease_creation_is_safe_under_parallel_calls fails with JSON trailing characters under concurrent sv take

tasks.title: List TUI: Change staus easily with 's'
tasks.body: In list normal mode, let 's' be a select for the statuses that the currently selected task can be set, and on 'enter' set that status for that task. 'esc' to escape/cancel

tasks.title: Inline editor: remove relate note
tasks.body: Remove the relate note field; it's likely unnecessary.

tasks.title: Add fields to edit mode
tasks.body: Edit mode should have all fields as new tasks have, allowing us to add previously none existing relations and the like

tasks.title: Change list TUI commands
tasks.body: instead of having all statuses filtered directly on a/o/i/c, allow us to tab inside the / filter and select status filter through there.

tasks.title: Inline editor: inner field key handling
tasks.body: In inline editor, ignore other shortcuts while editing a field. Enter should switch into insert mode for the selected field. In insert mode, Enter or Tab returns to normal mode and selects the next field.

tasks.title: Inline editor: priority field select
tasks.body: Priority insert mode should open a select similar to 'p' in list TUI. Choice text should use the same colors as in list TUI.

tasks.title: Inline editor: parent field task lookup
tasks.body: Parent field should list existing task IDs + titles with search/autocomplete.

tasks.title: Inline editor: rename Relates to Children
tasks.body: Rename Relates to Children and, on create/edit, set selected tasks' parent to this task.

tasks.title: Inline editor: rename Description to Body
tasks.body: Rename Description to Body, place it second in the field list, and give it the same behavior as Title.

tasks.title: Tests: TUI new/edit/priority flows
tasks.body: Add or extend tests to cover new task wizard, priority change, and inline edit flows. Focus on validation (title required), cancel/no-op behavior, and persistence.

tasks.title: TUI: Update keybindings/help for n/p/e
tasks.body: Expose new commands in the TUI help/command list and any on-screen hints. Keep language short and consistent with existing UX.

tasks.title: TUI: Change priority ('p')
tasks.body: Add a command to set/change priority for the currently selected task. Provide a small priority picker and persist via sv task update. Handle cancel and no-op when unchanged.

tasks.title: TUI: Inline edit selected task ('e')
tasks.body: Add inline editor for selected task (title and description at minimum). Reuse/new component similar to new task wizard; require confirmation before save. Handle cancel and validation errors.

tasks.title: TUI: New task wizard ('n')
tasks.body: Add a TUI flow for creating a new task. Required field: title. Optional fields: priority, related tasks/epics, description. Support cancel/back and confirm before create. Persist via existing task creation pathway.

tasks.title: TUI: Shared editor components
tasks.body: Extract or build shared TUI components/state for task create/edit flows (fields, validation, navigation, confirm/cancel). Used by new task wizard and inline edit.

tasks.title: Test plan for TUI logic
tasks.body:
Unit tests for filter, sort, selection preservation
Cache invalidation tests (width change, selection change)
No heavy e2e; note manual UI checks
Acceptance: test plan doc + initial tests implemented

tasks.title: Docs update for task viewer
tasks.body:
Add docs/task_viewer.md: UX, keymap, perf budgets, data sources
Update docs/prd-tasks.md with TUI entry + v1/v2 scope
Update docs/README.md index
Acceptance: docs merged and linked

tasks.title: v2 actions spec: start/close/comment
tasks.body:
Read-only v1; v2 adds start/close/comment actions
Design: use existing TaskStore ops (no shelling)
Confirm status transitions + actor handling
Acceptance: v2 spec + safety prompts

tasks.title: Filter + status shortcuts behavior
tasks.body:
Fuzzy filter over id + title; incremental search
Quick status filters: o=open, p=in_progress, c=closed, a=all
Clear: esc; toggle: /; indicator row in header
Acceptance: filtering spec + keymap integration

tasks.title: File watch + reload pipeline
tasks.body:
Watch: .tasks/tasks.jsonl, .tasks/tasks.snapshot.json, .git/sv/tasks.*
Debounce reload 150-300ms; coalesce bursts
On change: background reload -> UI message -> swap model
Handle watch errors gracefully in status banner
Acceptance: watch spec + error handling plan

tasks.title: Renderer: list/detail + caching + virtualization
tasks.body:
Render only visible list window + detail viewport
Cache list rows by (task_id, width, selected)
Cache detail body by (task_id, width)
Markdown render cached; fallback to wrapped text if perf fails
Acceptance: renderer plan + cache invalidation rules

tasks.title: Data loading + snapshot strategy
tasks.body:
Priority: .git/sv/tasks.snapshot.json then .tasks/tasks.snapshot.json
Fallback: fold log only if no snapshot (with warning banner)
Selection persistence: keep by task id on reload
Sort order: status rank -> updated_at desc -> id
Acceptance: spec for data sources + selection rules + sort rules

tasks.title: TUI architecture + module layout
tasks.body:
Stack: ratatui + crossterm + notify (debounced)
Modules: ui/model.rs, ui/view.rs, ui/input.rs, ui/style.rs, ui/cache.rs
Data flow: TaskStore -> view model -> render tree
Threading: background loader + channel to UI loop
Acceptance: architecture note + module boundaries + data structs

tasks.title: Perf plan + budgets for task TUI
tasks.body:
Targets: cold start <150ms @1k tasks, <300ms @5k; keypress-to-frame <16ms; reload <50ms
Strategy: retained caches + differential render + no idle ticks
Snapshot-first load; avoid log fold on startup
Profiling: SV_TASK_PROFILE=1 timing logs (load/parse/render)
Acceptance: perf plan documented + profiling spec + risk list

tasks.title: Spec v1 TUI UX + layout
tasks.body:
Scope: fullscreen split view (list left, detail right) + narrow mode single pane
Keymap: j/k, arrows, / filter, esc clear, q quit, r reload, ? help
Visual hierarchy: status pill, id, title, workspace; metadata row in detail
Error states: empty, load error, watch error, no selection
Deliverable: UX spec doc with wireframe sketches + keymap table
Acceptance: doc reviewed, covers v1 read-only and v2 actions placeholder

tasks.title: Document sv task in README and PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION
